mapper.insert: insert into finance_clearing_send ( id, batch_no, buiness_name, buiness_no, message, result, create_time )values ( #{id}, #{batchNo}, #{buinessName}, #{buinessNo}, #{message}, #{result}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update:
update finance_clearing_send
id=#{id},
batch_no=#{batchNo},
buiness_name=#{buinessName},
buiness_no=#{buinessNo},
message=#{message},
result=#{result},
create_time=#{createTime},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, batch_no, buiness_name, buiness_no, message, result, create_time from finance_clearing_send where id=#{id}
select id, batch_no, buiness_name, buiness_no, message, result, create_time from finance_clearing_send where id=#{id}

select id, batch_no, buiness_name, buiness_no, message, result, create_time
limit #{offset},#{rows}
